SET(GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/googletest")
SET(GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/googletest/${KLAYGE_PLATFORM_NAME}")

UpdateExternalLib("googletest" "https://github.com/google/googletest.git" "703bd9caab50b139428cea1aaff9974ebee5742e")

set(BUILD_GMOCK OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(INSTALL_GTEST OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(gtest_disable_pthreads ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(gtest_force_shared_crt ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

ADD_SUBDIRECTORY("${GOOGLETEST_PROJECT_DIR}/googletest" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/googletest")

SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(gtest PROPERTIES
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${GOOGLETEST_OUTPUT_DIR}
	DEBUG_POSTFIX ${CMAKE_DEBUG_POSTFIX}
	OUTPUT_NAME gtest${KLAYGE_OUTPUT_SUFFIX}
	FOLDER "${EXTERNAL_VS_FOLDER_PREFIX}/googletest"
)
set_property(TARGET gtest PROPERTY PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY)
